item.title: Fox Sees Q4 Profit Rise on Fox News, Tubi Results
item.description: Fox Corp. said high ratings at Fox News Channel and growing advertiser interest at its Tubi streaming service bolstered performance in its fiscal fourth quarter, with the company’s focus on live
